questions.quote: You heard her. She coveted them. I bet she took them just to spite me. She's probably having a good laugh about it right now.
Hello, this is Chemical Bank. Just wanted you to know that your checking account is overdrawn.
So you went from the mailroom to the director of corporate development in two days?
Hey, George, do me a favour. If they make you an offer, whatever it is.  Just take it!
You don't understand. I'm in a very delicate position. Whatever I give her, she's going to be bringing in experts from all over the country to interpret the meaning behind it.
Hey, you know what? Maybe he's a diabetic, he might just need a cookie or something.
That's different. I didn't have feelings for those people. But you, you'll backslide
So we could put the bottles in a U-haul. You know, go lean and mean?
Whew! I got whooped. You should have seen the rage in their little eyes. And those tiny little fists of fury. Oh.  What is that?
It's all departures. I see nothing but departures.  Do you know where the arrivals are?
